title: Schemers will Fall for Schemes, ~Before~
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>This goes here…. There! Kufufu…. Perfect if Kasumin can say so herself~. When we pull this lottery, the next live’s first performer will be Kasumin….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Good work today~.... Oh, is it just you, Kasumi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Piyaah!? K-, Karin-senpai, please don’t go in so suddenly like that-! You surprised Kasumin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Surprised….? Kasumi-chan, are you planning something again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Fueh!? K-, k- k- Kasumin isn’t doing anything! Kasumin has always been clean!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Ah! That girl is waving from outside the window!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh!? Senpai!? From where, where? Senpaaai♡<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>….I see. So this is what you did….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Kasumi-chan. The lottery pull has to be fair, okay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
